DOC.brief_summary: This 4-week , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , parallel group active control study . Patients randomize ( 1 1 ratio ) 4-week double-blind treatment period either FDC tiotropium + olodaterol ( 5/5 µg ) plus placebo free combination tiotropium 5 µg olodaterol 5 µg ; administer via Respimat® inhaler . The purpose show non-inferiority FDC free combination tiotropium olodaterol patient COPD .
DOC.brief_title: Fixed Dose Combination Versus Free Combination Tiotropium Olodaterol COPD
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female patient . Patients 40 year age old . Patients smoke history > 10 pack year . Diagnostic COPD Postbronchodilator FEV1 > = 30 % < 80 % predict normal Postbronchodilator FEV1/FVC < 70 % screening . Symptomatic patient CAT score > = 10 screening . Further inclusion criterion apply . Exclusion criterion : COPD exacerbation symptom low respiratory tract infection within 6 week prior screen . Patients current diagnosis asthma . Further exclusion criterion apply .
